Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Welcome to the <clr:0000>Slippery Falcon <clr:ffff>general
store. <sp:5:0:0>Do you never sleep?
Talk1007: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Of course. <sp:5:0:0>What do you have for me?
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'm sold out of everything, but if you're
here to sell, we can still make a deal.
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>My apologies, but that's one thing
I can't buy from you.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS>This is a general store. We stock whatever
you may need, from personal-defense
tools to useful materials.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Why don't we try this again sometime
when you're not actively wearing that?
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>That shop being the <clr:0000>Slippery Falcon<clr:ffff>
general store. Browse at your leisure.
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Welcome! You've come to the <clr:0000>Slippery
Falcon <clr:ffff>general store.
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Show me what you're offering to sell.
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0001>And what are you willing to part with?
Talk2014: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Thank you! Looks like I'm sold out now.
Talk2015: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Thank you very much! I'll have to restock.
Com_Talk_02c: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>How could I pass up such a deal?
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Be sure to take a gander at my <clr:0000>recipe
book <clr:ffff>near the store entrance.<sp:0:4:0>If you're not sure how to use our
ingredients to cook a nice meal, you'll
find plenty of ideas in its pages!
Talk2016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks very much! I'll get these back in
stock as soon as I can.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Have you already perused the <clr:0000>recipe book<clr:ffff>
at the store's entrance?<sp:0:4:0>If anything in it looks good to you,
then you're in luckâ€”you can buy the
ingredients you need right here.
Talk2017: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Wow, you've cleaned me out! Thank you!
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Think of us the next time you
need anything.
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Did nothing suit your fancy? Perhaps next
time, then.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>I'm sorry, <sp:5:0:0>but you don't seem to have
enough rupees to cover your purchase.
Talk001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We found these strange things at the foot
of the Hebra Mountains. <sp:5:0:0>They're oddly
shaped, aren't they?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've done every test I can think of, but I
haven't learned anything. <sp:5:0:0>Not even what
they're made of or what they're for.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>All I know is that they're pretty heavy
and pretty sharp. <sp:5:0:0>It'd probably hurt if
you got hit with one, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>Well, I've got all I'm going to get out of
these things. <sp:5:0:0>If you want them for some
reason, they're all yours.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>It seems that your pouch is full.<sp:0:4:0>Are you sure you really need everything
you're carrying? You could always sell
some of it here.
Talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>These things sure are strange, huh?
I can't begin to guess who made them
or for what purpose.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300>All I know is that it'd hurt pretty bad if
you got hit by one.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>And they've been falling from the sky!
What is going on in the air up above the
Hebra Mountains?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I don't have any use for these, so they're
yours if you want them.
Talk003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We found these strange things at the foot
of the Hebra Mountains. <sp:5:0:0>They're oddly
shaped, aren't they?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've done every test I can think of, but I
haven't learned anything. <sp:5:0:0>Not even what
they're made of or what they're for.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>All I know is that they're pretty heavy
and pretty sharp. <sp:5:0:0>It'd probably hurt if
you got hit with one, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>Well, I've got all I'm going to get out of
these things. <sp:5:0:0>If you want them for some
reason, they're all yours.
Talk1016: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I look forward to your future patronage.
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Thank you for your business! We sell
other things as well, if you'd like to have
a look around.
Talk2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thanks to the kids, my shop is back
in business!<sp:0:4:0>Even now that she doesn't need to run
the shop anymore, Cree is going around
the village advertising for me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Plus, with the blizzard gone, I can stay
stocked up on products again. <sp:5:1:0>With a bit
of work, my shop will be better than ever!
Talk1019: <sp:3:0:2:0001>If you need anything else, just ask!
